charges.charge_description: On or about and between March 24, 1997 and June 29, 1999 in Monroe County, in the Western District of New York, the defendants did enter into a marriage for the purpose of evading any provision of the immigrations laws; making material false statements and providing material false documents to INS, an agency of the United States; and making false statements under oath with respect to a material fact in an application and other documents required by INS in violation of Title 18 U.S.C. Sections 1546 and 1001 and Title 8 U.S.C. Section 1325(c)

On or about and between March 24, 1997 and June 29, 1999 in Monroe County, in the Western District of New York, the defendants did enter into a marriage for the purpose of evading any provision of the immigrations laws; making material false statements and providing material false documents to INS, an agency of the United States; and making false statements under oath with respect to a material fact in an application and other documents required by INS in violation of Title 18 U.S.C. Sections 1546 and 1001 and Title 8 U.S.C. Section 1325(c)
